answers.answer: Oh im sorry i took the one hour test last week and i do no go see the doctor til the 8th i really wanna call the doctor and see what happen but i know they will not tell
I took my one hour test yesterday. I have a feeling i will fail it because my mother did while she was pregnant with both me and my little sister. I wish you the very best of luck.
I failed my test and now im on a strict sugar free diet..
Nolegirl, once they have the results they should tell you if you call and ask...
I went through the same thing! Totally sucked!
I failed my 1 hour test.. 1 point.  Now I have to go back for 3 hour test.  Staying positive though.
I, too, failed the 1st glucose test, but passed my 3hr test. Hope you do too!

Just found out I failed my 1 hour test too. I go on Wed for the 3 hour one. My appointment wad in the afternoon and I had a feeling I was going to fall it. I didn't have problems with my first 2 pregnancies, so hopefully this will be nothing.

question: I failed my 1 hour glucose test last week and had to go today for the 3 hour test. I was miserable and almost passed out from hunger. I pray that after all of that I do not have diabetes. It would really suck. Just venting:(
title: Failed Test
